message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a price of $85 for the product.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're willing to pay $85, but I think the product is worth a bit more. I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $92. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $88 for the product.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $91. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $89 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob! I'm willing to sell the product to you for $90. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $87 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob! I'm willing to sell the product to you for $89. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
